title: Judaism Transcends Catastrophe: God, Torah, and Israel Beyond the Holocaust, Vol. 1: Faith Renewed- The Judaic Affirmation Beyond the Holocaust
description: Begins a five-volume anthology documenting the strength of Judaism in the wake of the devastation of the European Jewish population by Nazi Germany. Ten contributions discuss defining terms, bearing witness, the voice of Auschwitz, and confronting the experience. No index. Annotation copyright Book News, Inc. Portland, Or.
author: Jacob J.Neusner
